content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Copper plate factory at position(0, 0)
Consists of following entities
- Furnace at position (0.0, 0.0)
- Furnace at position (2.0, 0.0)
- Furnace at position (2.0, 2.0)

### Electricity generator at position(0, 0)
Consists of steam engine at position (0, 0) and boiler at position (0, 1)

### Copper cable factory at position(0, 0)
Consists of following entities
- Assembling machine at position (1, 0) and inserter at position (1, 1) that puts into assembling machine
- Beltgroup that connects the furnace at position (2.0, 0.0) to assembling machine at position (1, 0)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.

### Errors related to no ingredients in furnaces
- Check the inventory to ensure you have the required ingredients before attempting to use furnaces.
